name: Csaba Szegedi
title: Cloud Architect
bio: With over 20 years as a developer and cloud architect, I specialize in crafting scalable, secure AWS solutions. As a Senior Cloud Architect, I prefer to automate with tools like CloudFormation, Lambda, EC2, S3, and IAM, coding in Python, Java, C#, Go, and JavaScript to optimize processes. As an AWS Community Builder, I'm dedicated to mentoring and sharing expertise. In 2024, I founded a company delivering affordable, hands-on AWS training, empowering organizations to rapidly master cloud skills through tailored, practical programs.
session_titles: AWS Account Management with the AWS Console Mobile App
